p: The known steroid glycosides; sitosterol-3- O-β- d-glucopyranoside acetate ( 114), stigmasterol-3- O-β- d-glucopyranoside acetate ( 115), sitosterol-3- O-β- d-glucopyranoside ( 116) (Fig. 24), as well as a mixture of β-sitosterol and stigmasterol ( 112) were identified from the leaves of Turraea nilotica (Meliaceae) [ 95]. The glycosides only showed weak to moderate antiplasmodial activities against the D6 and W2 strains.
